description: Board of Invesment - Order to declare that ptroject to set up a Refinary to import raw Sugar for refining & sale in the Local & export market in the free-port area of the Hambanthota Port in the Sourthern Prvince under Sub-sec (4) of sec. 3 of Strategic Development projects Acts No. 14 of 2008 (Lanka Sugar Refinary Company (Pvt) Ltd.
